transaction_categories.name: Salary
transaction_categories.description: Monthly salary income from employer.

transaction_categories.name: Freelance Income
transaction_categories.description: Income from freelance projects or side jobs.

transaction_categories.name: Investment Income
transaction_categories.description: Income generated from investments (e.g., dividends, interest).

transaction_categories.name: Rental Income
transaction_categories.description: Income from renting out property.

transaction_categories.name: Bank Interest
transaction_categories.description: Interest earned from savings accounts or investments.

transaction_categories.name: Groceries
transaction_categories.description: Expenses for food and household supplies.

transaction_categories.name: Utilities
transaction_categories.description: Expenses for utilities like electricity, water, gas, etc.

transaction_categories.name: Rent/Mortgage
transaction_categories.description: Monthly rent or mortgage payment for housing.

transaction_categories.name: Transportation
transaction_categories.description: Expenses related to transportation, including gas, car payments, or public transit.

transaction_categories.name: Insurance
transaction_categories.description: Insurance payments (e.g., health, life, car).

transaction_categories.name: Entertainment
transaction_categories.description: Spending on leisure activities like movies, dining out, etc.

transaction_categories.name: Medical
transaction_categories.description: Expenses related to healthcare and medical bills.

transaction_categories.name: Debt Repayment
transaction_categories.description: Payments toward credit card or loan debt.

transaction_categories.name: Savings
transaction_categories.description: Monthly savings contribution to a bank account or investment fund.

transaction_categories.name: Taxes
transaction_categories.description: Income tax payments or other tax-related expenses.

transaction_categories.name: Education
transaction_categories.description: Expenses related to education, such as tuition or books.

transaction_categories.name: Gifts & Donations
transaction_categories.description: Money spent on gifts or charitable donations.

transaction_categories.name: Miscellaneous
transaction_categories.description: Other expenses that do not fit into the above categories.

transaction_categories.name: Deficit
transaction_categories.description: Any shortfall when expenses exceed income.

transaction_categories.name: Uncategorized
transaction_categories.description: Transactions that have not been categorized yet.

transaction_categories.name: Other Income
transaction_categories.description: Any other sources of income not listed above.

transaction_categories.name: Electronics & Accessories
transaction_categories.description: Expenses related to purchasing electronic devices and accessories.

transaction_categories.name: Travel & Accommodation
transaction_categories.description: Expenses for travel, lodging, and related costs.

transaction_categories.name: Subscriptions & Memberships
transaction_categories.description: Recurring expenses for subscriptions and memberships.

transaction_categories.name: Home Maintenance & Repairs
transaction_categories.description: Costs associated with maintaining and repairing a home.

transaction_categories.name: Clothing & Apparel
transaction_categories.description: Spending on clothing and related items.

transaction_categories.name: Dining Out & Takeaway
transaction_categories.description: Expenses for eating out at restaurants or ordering takeaway food.

transaction_categories.name: Rentals & Leases
transaction_categories.description: Expenses for renting or leasing items or properties for temporary use.

transaction_categories.name: Personal Care & Hygiene
transaction_categories.description: Expenses related to personal care and hygiene products or services.
